dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5123 IH: Credit Monitoring Integrity Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Porter introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Fair Credit Reporting Act to modify the applicability of credit monitoring for active duty military consumers, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Credit Monitoring Integrity Act of 2023.

section.header: Amendment to applicability of credit monitoring for active duty military consumers
section.text: Section 605A(k) of the Fair Credit Reporting Act (15 U.S.C. 1681câ€“1(k)) is amended by striking paragraph (4).
